sentence.Network_en: O Arjuna, nescience, inertness, neglectfulness and also illusion; when these arise the mode of ignorance predominates.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿诸那啊, 无知, 消沉, 疏忽和妄想, 当所有这些一起呈现的时候,就是愚昧无知占了主导地位.

sentence.Network_en: The people are returned to passiveness, inertness, and unconsciousness; the legislator enters into omnipotence.
sentence.Network_cn: 人民返回被动 、 钝和无意识, 立法者则变得无所不能.

sentence.Network_en: It has characteristics of chemical inertness, high - whiteness, high purity and equal particle size.
sentence.Network_cn: 具有粒度分布均匀,化学性能稳定, 色白 、 质纯特点.
